Apt: Fellowship, Social, Slaanesh
system.descriptor: Misleading others as to the user's true intent, lying, or spinning information to manipulate someone. Test made only when deception would change a person's mind, opinion, or actions. Disguising oneself
system.uses:
Use: When used against an opponent, is an Opposed Test vs target's Scrutiny, affects number of targets up to 10x Character's Fellowship Bonus. Used for Telling convincing lies, distracting someone, etc.
Special Use: Disguise: Create a disguise provided there is time and resources to do so. Time taken depends on complexity, putting on makeup, wearing a new uniform are simple, hiding geneder, race, mimicking someone particular may take hours, days, or longer. Once disguised, GM secretly tests character's Deceive whenever the disguise is under scrutiny, if passed, need not test again until a significant change occurs.
system.useTime: 1 Minute or more for complex deceptions
